product_description: plastic medium dark blue rectangle shaped snack box with a light blue lid with animal planet aquarium cover design in the top

copy_data.primary_copy: Make lunchtime an underwater adventure! This stylish aquarium-themed box keeps snacks fresh while sparking imagination.
copy_data.headline: Dive Into Delightful Snack Storage
copy_data.description: Transform everyday snacks into an oceanic experience with this Animal Planet lunch box featuring a mesmerizing aquarium design and secure-seal lid.

claude_optimized_prompt: A photorealistic lunch scene on a modern white kitchen counter, medium dark blue snack box with light blue lid featuring aquarium design, surrounded by fresh fruits and healthy snacks, soft natural lighting from left window, shallow depth of field, professional product photography style, rule of thirds composition with negative space, 8k quality

image_generation_result.revised_prompt: A photorealistic lunchtime scene on a modern white kitchen counter. The centerpiece is a medium dark blue snack box with a light blue lid featuring an aquarium-themed design, including fish and coral. The snack box is surrounded by fresh fruits such as apples, oranges, and berries, along with an assortment of healthy snacks like nuts and granola bars. The scene is illuminated by soft natural lighting streaming through a window on the left. The composition follows the rule of thirds, with negative space on one side, and the focus is enhanced by a shallow depth of field. The photograph appears in an 8k professional quality, resembling product photography.
image_generation_result.original_prompt: A photorealistic lunch scene on a modern white kitchen counter, medium dark blue snack box with light blue lid featuring aquarium design, surrounded by fresh fruits and healthy snacks, soft natural lighting from left window, shallow depth of field, professional product photography style, rule of thirds composition with negative space, 8k quality
